thread.title: Dow Chemical’s Andrew Liveris to Depart; Jim Fitterling to be CEO of New Dow After Breakup

author: David Benoit
title: Dow Chemical’s Andrew Liveris to Depart; Jim Fitterling to be CEO of New Dow After Breakup
text:
Longtime Dow Chemical Co. leader Andrew Liveris plans to step down next month, ending a nearly 14-year tenure that culminated with the chemical giant’s combination last year with rival DuPont Co.
Mr. Liveris will relinquish the role of executive chairman of the combined company April 1, it announced Monday. Co-lead director Jeff Fettig will assume that role at the company, now known as DowDuPont Inc. and soon to be broken apart.
Liveris... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
